title: Monster Examine

properties.name: description
properties.value: Monster Examine is a lunar spell that requires 66 Magic plus the quests Dream Mentor and Lunar Diplomacy to be cast. It costs 1 Mind rune, 1 Cosmic rune, and 1 Astral rune to cast and grants 61 Magic experience per cast. There are a few monsters in the game which can not be examined by this spell.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Monster Examine
Monster Examine
Released 15 May 2007 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 66
Spellbook Lunar
Type Combat
Experience 61
Runes 1 1 1
Quest Dream Mentor
(plus Lunar Diplomacy)
Description Detect the combat statistics of a monster
Animation
Sound Effect

Monster Examine is a lunar spell that requires 66 Magic plus the quests Dream Mentor and Lunar Diplomacy to be cast. It costs 1 Mind rune, 1 Cosmic rune, and 1 Astral rune to cast and grants 61 Magic experience per cast. There are a few monsters in the game which can not be examined by this spell.

Contents

  • 1 Information
    • 1.1 Stats
    • 1.2 Aggressive Stats
    • 1.3 Defensive Stats
    • 1.4 Other Attributes
  • 2 Cost
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 References

Information[edit | edit source]

The interface that appears after casting Monster Examine.

The spell gives a large amount of information about the monster examined in four tabs:

Stats[edit | edit source]

  • Monster's combat level
  • Current hitpoints
  • Current Attack
  • Current Defence
  • Current Strength
  • Current Magic
  • Current Ranged
  • Max hit (does not count special attacks)
  • Main attack style

Aggressive Stats[edit | edit source]

If a monster does not have a bonus of any kind, it is omitted from the interface.

  • Attack speed
  • Attack bonus
    • Applicable to whatever melee style the NPC uses by default[1]. For example, casting the spell on Justiciar Zachariah would display an Attack bonus of 200 under the Aggressive Stats tab. This means that in actuality, he has a Slash bonus of +200, as slash is the only melee style he uses.
  • Stab bonus
  • Slash bonus
  • Crush bonus
  • Magic bonus
  • Ranged bonus
  • Strength bonus
  • Ranged strength bonus
  • Magic strength bonus (i.e. magic damage[2])

Defensive Stats[edit | edit source]

  • Stab bonus
  • Slash bonus
  • Crush bonus
  • Magic bonus
  • Ranged bonus

Other Attributes[edit | edit source]

If a monster does not possess a certain criteria, it is omitted from the interface.

  • Informs players whether the monster can be killed for a Slayer task.
  • Informs players whether the monster is a slayer boss monster that can be killed for a slayer assignment.
  • Informs whether the monster can be poisoned or is immune to venom.
  • Informs whether the monster can be attacked using a dwarf multicannon.
  • Informs whether the monster is immune to thralls.
  • Informs whether the monster is demonic.
  • Informs whether the monster is draconic.
  • Informs whether the monster is vampyric, and the tier of vampyrism it is classified under.
  • Informs whether the monster is spectral.
  • Informs whether the monster is a golem.

Cost[edit | edit source]

Spell cost
InputCost
111247

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
6 January 2021
(update)

The spell now informs whether a monster is classified as a spectral creature.

24 May 2018
(update)

Magic damage and tier of vampyre is now shown.

8 February 2018
(update)

Weaknesses to dragonbane weapons are now shown.

4 January 2018
(update)

The Monster Examine spell can now reflect the true poison immunity of cows.

14 June 2016
(update)

Weaknesses to demonbane weapons are now shown.

11 February 2016
(update)

Ranged strength is now shown.

12 November 2015
(update | poll)

The spell now shows much more information; previously, the spell only showed combat level, hitpoints and max hit (not counting special attacks).

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 20 February 2018. (Archived from the original on 30 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "You know how that spell lists "Main attack style"? If the listed main attack style is stab, slash or crush, the attack bonus will be its accuracy bonus in that style."
  2. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 21 June 2018. (Archived from the original on 30 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "[Is ["Magic str bonus"] equivalent to the Magic Damage % for players?] Yup."

[[File:Monster Examine icon (mobile).png|left]]
'''Monster Examine''' is a [[lunar spell]] that requires 66 [[Magic]] plus the quests [[Dream Mentor]] and [[Lunar Diplomacy]] to be cast. It costs 1 [[Mind rune]], 1 [[Cosmic rune]], and 1 [[Astral rune]] to cast and grants 61 Magic experience per cast. There are [[:Category:Monster examine impossible|a few monsters]] in the game which can not be examined by this spell. 
{{clear|left}}

==Information==
[[File:Monster Examine (interface).png|thumb|The interface that appears after casting Monster Examine.]]
The spell gives a large amount of information about the monster examined in four tabs:
===[[File:Monster Examine general.png|25px]] Stats===
*Monster's [[combat level]]
*Current [[hitpoints]]
*Current [[Attack]]
*Current [[Defence]]
*Current [[Strength]]
*Current [[Magic]]
*Current [[Ranged]]
*[[Max hit]] (does not count special attacks)
*Main [[attack style]]

===[[File:Attack icon.png]] Aggressive Stats===
If a monster does not have a bonus of any kind, it is omitted from the interface.
*[[Attack speed]]
*Attack bonus
**Applicable to whatever melee style the NPC uses by default{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/966611692259078144|date=20 February 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/vWkVt|archivedate=30 May 2020|quote=You know how that spell lists "Main attack style"? If the listed main attack style is stab, slash or crush, the attack bonus will be its accuracy bonus in that style.}}. For example, casting the spell on [[Justiciar Zachariah]] would display an Attack bonus of 200 under the Aggressive Stats tab. This means that in actuality, he has a Slash bonus of +200, as slash is the only melee style he uses.
*Stab bonus
*Slash bonus
*Crush bonus
*Magic bonus
*Ranged bonus
*Strength bonus
*Ranged strength bonus
*Magic strength bonus (i.e. [[magic damage]]{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1009727169998835712|date=21 June 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/kakJu|archivedate=30 May 2020|quote=[Is ["Magic str bonus"] equivalent to the Magic Damage % for players?] Yup.}})

===[[File:Defence icon.png]] Defensive Stats===
*Stab bonus
*Slash bonus
*Crush bonus
*Magic bonus
*Ranged bonus

===[[File:Monster Examine other attributes.png]] Other Attributes===
If a monster does not possess a certain criteria, it is omitted from the interface.
*Informs players whether the monster can be killed for a [[Slayer task]].
*Informs players whether the monster is a slayer boss monster that can be killed for a slayer assignment.
*Informs whether the monster can be [[poison]]ed or is immune to [[venom]].
*Informs whether the monster can be attacked using a [[dwarf multicannon]].
*Informs whether the monster is immune to [[thrall]]s.
*Informs whether the monster is [[Demon (attribute)|demonic]].
*Informs whether the monster is [[Draconic (attribute)|draconic]].
*Informs whether the monster is [[Vampyre (attribute)|vampyric]], and the tier of vampyrism it is classified under.
*Informs whether the monster is [[Spectral (attribute)|spectral]].
*Informs whether the monster is a [[Golem (attribute)|golem]].
